title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Skills: Exploring the Relationship Between Management Control Systems and Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cybernetic applications of Management Control Systems (MCS) and explain their relationship with organizational learning through structural equation modeling
Learners can explain the moderating effect of feedback (feedforward) on the relationship between MCS utilization and organizational learning through case studies
Learners can demonstrate through project reports how organizational learning mediates the relationship between MCS utilization and individual performance

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
